machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;End Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma

M104 S0
M107
M140 S0
G91
G1 E-1 F300
G1 Z+3 E-2 F9000
G90
G28

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Start Gcode for {machine_name}
;Author: Dagoma

;Sliced: {date} {time}
;Estimated print time: {print_time}

;Print speed: {speed_print}mm/s
;Layer height: {layer_height}mm
;Wall thickness: {wall_thickness}mm
;Infill density: {infill_sparse_density}%
;Infill pattern: {infill_pattern}
;Support: {support_enable}
;Print temperature: {material_print_temperature}°C
;Flow: {material_flow}%
;Retraction amount: {retraction_amount}mm
;Retraction speed: {retraction_retract_speed}mm/s

G90 ;absolute positioning
M104 S120 ;Launch heating up to 120°C
M106 S255 ;Activating layers fans
G29 ;Homing and Calibration
M107 ;Off Ventilateur
M109 S{material_print_temperature} U-55 X55 V-85 Y-85 W0.26 Z0.26 ;Temperature for the first layer only
M82 ;Set extruder to absolute mode
G92 E0 ;Zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E6 ;Extrude 10mm of feed stock
G92 E0 ;Zero the extruded length again
G1 F200 E-3.5
G0 Z0.15
G0 X10
G0 Z3
G1 F{speed_travel}
M117 Printing...
